name: Warface – Yellow Emperor Pack
detailed_description:
This pack оffers primary weapons for all classes and a pistol of the fierce “Yellow Emperor” series. You will also receive 1000 Kredits under the blessing of the heavenly ruler. Strike fear into the unfortunate souls that cross your path with the help of mighty dragons!

The contents:



  • Five "Yellow Emperor" series weapons

  • 1000 Kredits

"Yellow Emperor" series weapons included:



  • ACR assault rifle

  • Fabarm STF 12 Compact shotgun

  • ACR CQB submachine gun

  • AS50 sniper rifle

  • Desert Eagle pistol

Kredits are a premium in-game currency in Warface. It allows you to purchase weapons, armor, boosters, consumables and much more.

short_description: This pack оffers primary weapons for all classes and a pistol of the fierce “Yellow Emperor” series. You will also receive 1000 Kredits under the blessing of the heavenly ruler. Strike fear into the unfortunate souls that cross your path with the help of mighty dragons!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E6-series / Athlon64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT 512MB / AMD Radeon HD 4830 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
